name: Blocky Griefers
description:
Blocky Griefers is a team based online game.
Mine blocks to earn cash, and buy items and blocks to grief your enemy's base.
Join online games or play with your friends!

The game's currently not so polished, but playable! ;D
Thanks to demon1000 for some awesome music!
http://demon1000.newgrounds.com/

IMPORTANT: My server is down. Go to options, click servers and choose another one. If none of those work check this site for more servers:
https://dark-wire.com/relay/

(made this about a year ago, I'm just reuploading it here)
